PARAMETER.NAME: NOTE_COMMANDINE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: The available options are based on Sqoop 1.4.4. If you use an earlier version, read the Sqoop documentation in order to find those which are not available.

DEFAULT.IF: ((DB_VERSION == 'MAPR1') OR (DB_VERSION == 'MAPR2') OR (DB_VERSION == 'MAPR212') OR (DB_VERSION == 'MAPR213') OR (DB_VERSION == 'MAPR301') OR (DB_VERSION == 'MAPR310') OR (DB_VERSION == 'MAPR401')) AND (DISTRIBUTION != 'CUSTOM')

PARAMETER.NAME: MAPRED_JOB_TRACKER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_JAVAAPI == 'true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DB_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' AND DB_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' AND DB_VERSION!='HDP_2_0' AND DB_VERSION!='HDP_2_1' AND DB_VERSION!='HDP_2_2' AND DB_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' AND DB_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5' AND DB_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1' AND DB_VERSION!='MAPR401' AND DB_VERSION!='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR'))

DEFAULT.IF: ((DB_VERSION == 'MAPR1') OR (DB_VERSION == 'MAPR2') OR (DB_VERSION == 'MAPR212') OR (DB_VERSION == 'MAPR213') OR (DB_VERSION == 'MAPR301') OR (DB_VERSION == 'MAPR310')) AND (DISTRIBUTION != 'CUSTOM')

PARAMETER.NAME: RESOURCE_MANAGER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_JAVAAPI == 'true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1' OR DB_VERSION=='MAPR401' OR DB_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR')))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_DATANODE_HOSTNAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_JAVAAPI == 'true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1') OR (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5') OR (DB_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR'))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KRB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: USE_JAVAAPI == 'true' AND (((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1') OR (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0'))) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM')))

PARAMETER.NAME: HADOOP_USER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: USE_JAVAAPI == 'true' AND (((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1') OR (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1') OR (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') OR ()DB_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR'))) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM')))

PARAMETER.NAME: PASSWORD_STORED_IN_FILE
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_COMMANDLINE == 'true' OR (USE_JAVAAPI=='true' AND (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1' OR DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR')))

PARAMETER.NAME: PASSWORD_FILE
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: PASSWORD_STORED_IN_FILE=='true' AND (USE_COMMANDLINE == 'true' OR (USE_JAVAAPI=='true' AND (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1' OR DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR')))

PARAMETER.NAME: PASSWORD
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: PASSWORD_STORED_IN_FILE=='false' OR (USE_JAVAAPI=='true' AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DB_VERSION!='HDP_2_1' AND DB_VERSION!='HDP_2_2' AND DB_VERSION!='HDP_2_0' AND DB_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5' AND DB_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1' AND DB_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' AND DB_VERSION!='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR')))

ITEM.NAME: avrofile
ITEM.NOT_SHOW_IF: (USE_JAVAAPI=='true' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_1' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' OR DB_VERSION=='MAPR1' OR DB_VERSION=='MAPR2' OR DB_VERSION=='MAPR212' OR DB_VERSION=='MAPR213' OR DB_VERSION=='MAPR301' OR DB_VERSION=='MAPR310' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3'))

PARAMETER.NAME: DELETE_TARGET_DIR
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_COMMANDLINE == 'true' OR (USE_JAVAAPI=='true' AND (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR')))

PARAMETER.NAME: QUERY_LABEL
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: When importing a free-form query, you must specify a destination directory. If you want to import the results of a query in parallel, you must select a splitting column with --split-by

PARAMETER.NAME: PRINT_LOG
PARAMETER.NOT_SHOW_IF: (USE_JAVAAPI=='true' AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='HORTONWORKS' AND DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA' AND DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3') OR (DISTRIBUTION=='MAPR' AND DB_VERSION=='MAPR1')))

PARAMETER.NAME: VERBOSE
PARAMETER.NOT_SHOW_IF: (PRINT_LOG=='false' OR (USE_JAVAAPI=='true' AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='HORTONWORKS' AND DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA' AND DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3') OR (DISTRIBUTION=='MAPR' AND DB_VERSION=='MAPR1'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: DEFINE_JAVA_MAPPING
PARAMETER.NOT_SHOW_IF: USE_JAVAAPI=='true' AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA' AND DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3') OR (DISTRIBUTION=='MAPR' AND DB_VERSION=='MAPR1'))

PARAMETER.NAME: JAVA_TYPE_MAPPING
PARAMETER.NOT_SHOW_IF: (DEFINE_JAVA_MAPPING=='false' OR (USE_JAVAAPI=='true' AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA' AND DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3') OR (DISTRIBUTION=='MAPR' AND DB_VERSION=='MAPR1'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: DEFINE_HIVE_MAPPING
PARAMETER.NOT_SHOW_IF: USE_JAVAAPI=='true' AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA' AND DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3') OR (DISTRIBUTION=='MAPR' AND DB_VERSION=='MAPR1'))

PARAMETER.NAME: HIVE_TYPE_MAPPING
PARAMETER.NOT_SHOW_IF: (DEFINE_HIVE_MAPPING=='false' OR (USE_JAVAAPI=='true' AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA' AND DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3') OR (DISTRIBUTION=='MAPR' AND DB_VERSION=='MAPR1'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: NOTE_CUSTOMER
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: This function only applies for HDP and Teradata

IMPORT.NAME: hadoop-conf-kerberos
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (USE_KRB=='true') AND (USE_JAVAAPI=='true') AND ((DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1') OR (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0')) AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')
